title: Joy for UK pubs and hugs tempered by rise in virus variant
content:
1. Joy for UK pubs and hugs tempered by rise in virus variant  The Associated Press
  2. Free at last to hug and party: UK reopens for business  Reuters UK
  3. COVID-19: England moves closer to freedom  Sky News
  4. Britain's pubs, museums are reopening and travel is allowed even as India coronavirus variant is on the rise  USA TODAY
  5. Pubs reopen for indoor service in London as Covid-19 restrictions ease | AFP  AFP News Agency
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 英国のパブとハグの喜びは、ウイルスの種類の増加で和らぐ
英国酒吧和拥抱的喜悦因病毒变体的增加而有所减弱
英國酒吧和擁抱的喜悅因病毒變體的增加而有所減弱
